title: Waabi raises $1B and expands into robotaxis with Uber

summary: Shadowfax shares fell about 9% on theirdebut, valuing the logistics firm near its last private valuation.

title: What you should know about the owners of US TikTok
summary: ​ByteDance, TikTok’s Chinese parent company, recently established a separate American entity to run the app’s U.S. operations. This restructuring aims to separate U.S. TikTok from its Chinese parent, addressing concerns about data privacy and foreign control. The move came after years of pressure from lawmakers, who feared the Chinese government’s potential access to Americans’ data. […]

title: The price gap between Waymo and Uber is narrowing
summary: A trip in a Waymo robotaxi still costs more, on average, than a comparable ride in a human-driven Uber or a Lyft. But that gap is narrowing, according to new data published Tuesday by Obi, a company that aggregates real-time pricing and pickup times across multiple ride-hailing services.

title: Grok is the most antisemitic chatbot according to the ADL
